General.Name: CopAur Minerals Inc
General.Description: CopAur Minerals Inc., an exploration stage company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in Canada. The company holds 100% interest in the Williams Gold Copper property located in British Columbia. It also entered into an option agreement to acquire Kinsley Mountain Gold Project located in southeast Elko County, Nevada. The company was formerly known as International Samuel Exploration Corp. and changed its name to CopAur Minerals Inc. in August 2020. CopAur Minerals Inc. is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
